title: anaga shambO
sahitya:
anagha shambhO dEva dEva pAhi mAm mahA prabhAva ashubha bhangabhAva sharva dhUrjaTE sadAshiva

anupallavi

vinata viSama haraNa nipuNa bhaya nirAsa guNa nivAsa vipula karuNa vidhrta hariNa dEshavAsa bhaktadAsa

caraNam

varada nigama mantra nihita giri tanujA prANanAtha parama vimala mahita carita vaidyanAtha vishvanAtha 
hara hara sudhashanEsha vyOmakEsha citprakAsha harita vilva vana tulasI vara dalArcita mahEsha
